title: King Codebra
description: Everyone knows that debugging is twice as hard as writing a program in the first place. So if you're as clever as you can be when you write it, how will you ever debug it?

title: Code Monkey
description: Some of the best programming is done on paper, really. Putting it into the computer is just a minor detail.

title: Lucky Duck
description: When you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. Your tastes only narrow & exclude people. So create.

title: Just Good with Great Habits
description: I'm not a great programmer; I'm just a good programmer with great habits.

title: Call me Moses
description: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen.
